page.title: 17WICHENFORD POST OFFICE
page.content: {Mrs. Pegram}has owned the{Post Office/ Shop for{7 years.}The post office section is quite separate from the shop.People can pay{rents, telephone, {gas,}and{electric bills, rates}and {television licences;}or operate{Giro accounts there as well as{posting. {Thursday,}pension day, is the busiest day for the Post Office. The mixed business stocks{fresh foods, {groceries, dairy foods, sweets, toys, {stationery, haberdashery, cigarettes and{newspapers.}Stock is topped up weekly, the owner goes to{Cash And {Carry}in her van. She also collects special orders from Worcester. Outlying residents can order goods by {telephone,}and these will be{delivered with the newspaper each day. The family is happy in the business, and enjoys all aspects of life in a small village.
